rows.label: tev000192_MSG0001
rows.name: Fancy meeting you here, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0002
rows.name:
How I wish we could have a pleasant conversation
over a nice cup of tea for once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0003
rows.name:
But unfortunately, I need to attend a new weapons
test after this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's not enough to simply check up on the Outfitters—
I also need to keep up with our arms manufacturers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0005
rows.name:
Speaking of which, what's your weapon of choice?
Do you prefer to fight from afar with ranged weapons,
or up close with melee weapons?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_JNK0010
rows.name: Ranged Weapons

rows.label: tev000192_SEL0011
rows.name: Say you prefer the enemy not see you coming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_JNK0020
rows.name: Melee Weapons

rows.label: tev000192_SEL0021
rows.name: Say you prefer getting up close and personal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0006
rows.name: Hmm. A contemporary choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0007
rows.name:
I imagine a preference for ranged combat would
quickly become ingrained in anyone trying to
survive on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0008
rows.name:
One would be nearly helpless against the flying
indigens here without some sort of projectile weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0009
rows.name:
Nor would it make much sense to face a flightless
indigen head-on when there are safer options.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0010
rows.name: Your choice is a prudent one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0011
rows.name:
Is that right? I hadn't realized you were a[ST:gender p1= man p2= woman ]
of such rarefied tastes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0012
rows.name:
In the right hands, a melee weapon can be more
reliable than any firearm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0013
rows.name: And no weapon more so than the sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0014
rows.name:
I once knew a man whose sword techniques were
beyond compare. I wish he was here so you could
meet him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'm sure his skill would make you even more enamored
with the sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0016
rows.name:
*ahem* Well, that's enough shop talk for now.
The test is about to begin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0017
rows.name:
Since you've come this far, is there anything you'd like
me to request from the AMs? Don't hold back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_JNK0110
rows.name: More Variety

rows.label: tev000192_SEL0111
rows.name: Explain that you'd like a wider range of weapons.

rows.label: tev000192_JNK0120
rows.name: Better Prices

rows.label: tev000192_SEL0121
rows.name: Say that you'd like weapons to be more affordable.

rows.label: tev000192_JNK0130
rows.name: Custom Gear

rows.label: tev000192_SEL0131
rows.name: Express your desire for custom equipment.

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0018
rows.name:
So you'd like to be able to choose from a wider array
of weaponry, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0019
rows.name:
I'm sure you can imagine what a challenge it is to
develop new armaments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0020
rows.name:
I will convey your message, although I doubt they
can accomplish that goal without the cooperation
of BLADE operatives such as yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0021
rows.name:
There's no doubt that lowering prices would put
higher quality gear into the hands of more BLADEs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'll be sure to ask them to do what they can to make
their wares more affordable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0023
rows.name:
But keep in mind these are not mere merchants—they
also need funds to R&D new equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0024
rows.name:
Since future weapons-development costs are funded by
the sales of current weapons, they may not be able to
accommodate your request so easily.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0025
rows.name:
Still, I'll see what I can do. Just don't hold it against
them if the prices fail to drop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0026
rows.name: Well. It seems you've a real mind for weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'm sure the technicians would be delighted to
accommodate you, though I doubt the bean counters
would be nearly so pleased.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0028
rows.name:
After all, they've been focusing their efforts on bringing
high-quality weapons to as many BLADE operatives as
possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0029
rows.name:
Custom equipment would be impossible to mass-
produce, and could also be prohibitively expensive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0030
rows.name:
But such a request might be more feasible once we've
finished building New LA and have become more
accustomed to life here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000192_MSG0031
rows.name:
Regardless, I'll make the request. Feel free to start
holding your breath in anticipation![ST:wait ]
